docs.lead_paragraph: A new study suggesting that broadly useful stem cells can be derived from amniotic fluid without destroying embryos in no way lessens the need to widen the array of embryonic stem cells available for research.
docs.snippet: A new study suggesting that broadly useful stem cells can be derived from amniotic fluid without destroying embryos in no way lessens the need to widen the array of embryonic stem cells available for research.

docs.lead_paragraph: Life is tight in their small apartment, but there is still room for large aspirations.

headline.main: Mother and Two Teenagers Make the Most of Cramped Spaces and Unlimited Goals
headline.print_headline: Mother and Two Teenagers Make the Most of Cramped Spaces and Unlimited Goals

docs.snippet: Life is tight in their small apartment, but there is still room for large aspirations.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: Life is tight in the small apartment. Tight physically. Tight financially. But there is still room for large aspirations. ''I want to have combined majors in mechanical and computer engineering and a minor in business,'' Dorichel Rodriguez, a high school senior and one of two teenage daughters living in the apartment with their mother, said recently.

headline.main: The Neediest Cases; Mother and Two Teenagers Make the Most of Cramped Spaces and Unlimited Goals

docs.abstract: Dorila Rodriguez and family receive wide range of services from Children's Aid Society, beneficiary agency of New York Times Neediest Cases Fund; photo (M)
